DESCRI

description: Details required by Conditions 3 (Details of the Materials for the Construction of the Air Handling Unit) and 4 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission 19/00005/FUL (Erection of Single storey extensions to the existing Rowan Bentall wing to create a new Cardiac facility. Alterations to the internal road layout. Erection of air handling plant on the roof of the existing out patient building.)
